Title: Bootstrap XML Navigation
Description: Bootstrap XML Navigation is an ASP.NET Server Control which provide the ability to off-load your Bootstrap navigation structure to external XML files.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Bootstrap XML Navigation is an ASP.NET Server Control which provide the ability to off-load your Bootstrap navigation structure to external XML files.

First off, I want to say I love Twitter Bootstrap. Bootstrap provides an amazing responsive framework to build web sites on. Web applications/sites can be rapidly stood-up with a great responsive look-and-feel.

The navigation component of Twitter Bootstrap is beast. Like many, I like to define my navigation in an external file. In my case and XML file.

Bootstrap XML Navigation is an ASP.NET Server Control which provide the ability to off-load your navigation structure to external XML files. I have used the server control with great success in multiple projects which use Twitter Bootstrap.

Ultimately, I wanted to clean up the HTML markup associated with navigation, which the control does, considerably. The XML associated with a Bootstrap XML Navigation menu is intuitive and easy to modify.

I welcome all recommendations to approve upon this code.
